# Clipperton Atoll 1874-1994 Sr/Ca and Oxygen Isotope Data
#----------------------------------------------------------------------- 
#                World Data Center for Paleoclimatology, Boulder 
#                                  and 
#                     NOAA Paleoclimatology Program 
#----------------------------------------------------------------------- 
# NOTE: Please cite Publication, and Online_Resource and date accessed when using these data. 
# If there is no publication information, please cite Investigators, Title, and Online_Resource and date accessed. 
#
#
# Online_Resource: https://www.ncdc.noaa.gov/cdo/f?p=519:1:::::P1_STUDY_ID:17380
#
# Original_Source_URL: ftp://ftp.ncdc.noaa.gov/pub/data/paleo/coral/east_pacific/wu2014/wu2014-2b.txt
# 
# Description/Documentation lines begin with #
# Data lines have no #
#
# Archive: Corals and Sclerosponges
#--------------------
# Contribution_Date
#	Date: 2014-11-04
#--------------------
# Title
#	Study_Name: Clipperton Atoll 1874-1994 Sr/Ca and Oxygen Isotope Data
#--------------------
# Investigators
#       Investigators: Wu, Henry C.; Moreau, M�lanie; Linsley, Braddock K.; Schrag, Daniel P.; Corr�ge, Thierry
#--------------------
# Description_and_Notes
#	Description: Monthly data from Porites lobata
#--------------------
# Publication 
#       Authors: Wu, Henry C.; Moreau, M�lanie; Linsley, Braddock K.; Schrag, Daniel P.; Corr�ge, Thierry
#       Published_Date_or_Year: 2014     
#       Published_Title: Investigation of sea surface temperature changes from replicated coral Sr/Ca variations in the eastern equatorial Pacific (Clipperton Atoll)
#       Journal_Name: Palaeogeography, Palaeoclimatology, Palaeoecology
#       Volume: 412
#       Edition: 
#       Issue: 
#       Pages: 208-222
#       DOI: 10.1016/j.palaeo.2014.07.039
#       Online_Resource: 
#       Full_Citation: 
#       Abstract: Sub-seasonally resolved and replicated coral Sr/Ca time series at Clipperton Atoll (10�18'N, 109�13'W) in the eastern Pacific are assessed as a sea surface temperature (SST) proxy in this region with small seasonal SST variability. The composite coral Sr/Ca time series is a partially replicated record of three live and one sub- modern colony of Porites lobata extending back to 1874. Large inter-colony coral Sr/Ca offsets equate to relative SST differences of 0.6 to 4.3 �C and limit the ability to reconstruct absolute SST changes. Moreover, the replication method revealed a 12-year section of growth in one colony where mean Sr/Ca was anomalously low (~1 �C higher SST) relative to the other colonies without evidence of diagenesis or other significant skeletal alterations. The presence of this anomalous interval supports the need for multi-coral Sr/Ca replication in specific sites or re- gions. The Clipperton Composite Sr/Ca anomaly record is significantly coherent (r = 0.71�0.76, p b 0.001) with gridded instrumental SSTs but with larger amplitude decadal variance that appears to more accurately represent actual SST variability at Clipperton. The amplitude of the secular warming trend during the last century at Clipperton is 0.3 to 0.6 �C larger (~twice as large) than the trend in the poorly �ground-truthed� instrumental SST records for the region. The interannual and decadal variability in Clipperton coral Sr/Ca demonstrates strong coherence to the Pacific Decadal Oscillation and the El Nin~o/Southern Oscillation (ENSO) with reduced ENSO variability from 1920 to late 1930s and enhanced variability in the late twentieth century.
#------------------
# Funding_Agency 
#       Funding_Agency_Name: National Science Foundation
#       Grant: SGER ATM9409368
#------------------
# Site_Information 
#       Site_Name: Clipperton Atoll
#       Location: Ocean>Pacific Ocean>Eastern Pacific Ocean
#	Country: France  
#	Northernmost_Latitude: 10.2773
# 	Southernmost_Latitude: 10.2773
# 	Easternmost_Longitude: -109.2131
# 	Westernmost_Longitude: -109.2121 
# 	Elevation: -13.1 m
#------------------
# Data_Collection   
#	Collection_Name: 14epac01b
#	Earliest_Year: 1934
#	Most_Recent_Year: 1993
#	Time_Unit: y_ad 
#	Core_Length: 1.26 m
#	Notes: {"database":"PAGES2"} Core name - 2B. Prevous name - Clipperton 2B Sr/Ca Wu14
#------------------
# Species
#	Species_Name: Porites lobata
#	Common_Name: 
#------------------
# Chronology:

#----------------
# Variables 
#
# Data variables follow that are preceded by "##" in columns one and two.
# Data line variables format:  Variables list, one per line, shortname-tab-longname-tab-longname components (9 components: what, material, error, units, seasonality, archive, detail, method, C or N for Character or Numeric data) 
#
##age	age, , ,years AD, , Corals and Sclerosponges, , ,N
##Sr/Ca	Strontium/Calcium, Porites lobata, ,mmol/mol, ,Corals and Sclerosponges, , ,N 
#
#----------------
# Data:
# Data lines follow (have no #)
# Data line format - tab-delimited text, variable short name as header
# Missing Values: NAN 
#
